item.description:
Anyone in the coastal North Shore area looking for some walking buddies?  Let's meet for a  5-6 mile walk after work and start enjoying the beautiful evenings of Spring! I'm bringing my dog, so other leashed, friendly dogs are welcome too (bring bags to clean up after your pet). 

This week we'll walk the 3 mile roundtrip Salisbury Rail Trail starting at Friedenfels Street (across from Stripers Grille), and then walk across the bridge for another 2-3 miles walking the Newburyport side of the trail.  It's a fairly scenic, beautiful, flat, paved trail, so it should be an easy and enjoyable walk.

This will be cross-posted with Social Fun and North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers. Walks will be cancelled due to inclement weather or lack of interest.
item.how_to_find_us: ACROSS FROM STRIPERS on Friedenfels Street is the trail head (next to the Marina) with plenty of parking
item.why: It's Spring- the snow is gone- let's get out and get active! Plus, by midweek my crazy dog needs a nice long walk!

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Walk After Work!
